experience.description: As a member of the software engineering team I am responsible for application development including middleware development between internal and external systems and web application development.

Creating and updating product web pages and product emails is my primary position. I also have a secondary position as Quality Assurance. I check products for quality that are in development and products that have already been released for current technologies.
Used the latest web technologies (Angular, AngularJS, Laravel PHP Blade) to build web applications for our clients both on Minnesota State University, Mankato campus and off campus.
Use a variety of web programming laguages for user interface development.
Developed company website to provide helpful information for series of organizational iPad apps developed by the iPad team.
Used Photoshop batch scripts to add materials to house images such as counters, walls, floors and ceilings.
Test bugs/glitches with games, created steam depots for steam game release, disc setup, and game play video for retail presentations and marketing events.
